title: Challenge of the oceans
creator_credit: Stanley Ruttenberg, Arnold Frutkin, Hugh Odishaw, Lothar Wolff and National Academy of Sciences (U.S.)
brief_description: A study of the physical, chemical and biological aspects of the oceans, showing the scope and objectives of oceanographic exploration. Explores the causes and reasons for the ocean currents and methods of measuring ocean depth.
